programlisting:
<file:die-see-1> a dmlex:Sense;
  dmlex:headwordTranslation [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:text "sea";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ];
  dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt.
<file:die-see> a dmlex:Entry;
  dmlex:sense <file:die-see-1>;
  dmlex:headword "See";
  dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
      dmlex:tag "n-fem";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ].
<file:das-meer> a dmlex:Entry;
  dmlex:sense <file:das-meer-1>;
  dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
      dmlex:tag "n-neut";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ];
  dmlex:headword "Meer".
<file:der-ozean> a dmlex:Entry;
  dmlex:headword "Ozean";
  dmlex:sense <file:der-ozean-1>;
  dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:tag "n-masc" ].
<file:der-ozean-1> a dmlex:Sense;
  dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
  dmlex:headwordTranslation [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:text "ocean";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ].
<file:das-meer-1> a dmlex:Sense;
  dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
  dmlex:headwordTranslation [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:text "sea" ].
[] a dmlex:LexicographicResource;
  dmlex:uri "http://example.com";
  dmlex:entry <file:das-meer>,
    <file:der-ozean>,
    <file:die-see>;
  dmlex:translationLanguage "en";
  dmlex:langCode "de";
  dmlex:relation [ a dmlex:Relation;
      dmlex:type "synonyms";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:member [ a dmlex:Member;
          dmlex:obverseListingOrder "0"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:listingOrder "2"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:memberID "das-meer-1" ],
        [ a dmlex:Member;
          dmlex:listingOrder "3"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:obverseListingOrder "0"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:memberID "der-ozean-1" ],
        [ a dmlex:Member;
          dmlex:obverseListingOrder "0"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:memberID "die-see-1" ];
      dmlex:description "words that mean sea and ocean" ].
